Translations.Text: hontōni ware wa, mītsu no yoru ni, kono (kuruān) o kudashita
Mītsu no yoru ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka
Mītsu no yoru wa, sen tsuki yori mo masaru
(Sono yoru) tenshi-tachi to seirei wa,-nushi no yurushi no moto ni, subete no kami inochi o motarashite kudaru
